short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn social media profiles into CRM contacts in 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description

üëãüèª Meet Jovie
The Social CRM

Jovie is a CRM that creates & enriches contacts from social media profiles.

With the Jovie chrome extension, you can instantly turn any social media profile into a CRM entry. Jovie will automatically organize all of your contacts and keep them up to date. 

üìù Organize your contacts
Jovie will automatically organize your contacts into categories so you can easily find them later. 

üìä Enrich your CRM with social data
Jovie automatically enriches contacts with social media data & contact info contact info so you have complete records without any manual data entry.

üí¨ Message your contacts
Jovie makes it easy to message your contacts directly from the app.`

Jovie is the perfect tool for sales and marketing professionals who want to get more out of their social media interactions. With Jovie, you can easily turn any social media profile into a CRM entry, and get valuable insights into your contacts' social media activity, contact info, and more.

By using the Jovie browser extension, you agree to Jovie‚Äôs terms and conditions. (https://www.jov.ie/legal)`
